boat.full_description:
'Orion' motored around the Dutch canals until 2013, used as accommodateion for her owner, G. Martin, whilst he was re-rigging her.

In the winter of 2013/14 her new owner worked on her rig, engine and internal fittings and sailed her to the UK in spring 2014. Since then 'Orion' has made numerous short voyages to many rivers, marinas and ports between Ramsgate and Lowestoft.

Refurbishment activities and installation of additional sails and rigging is ongoing.
boat.name: Orion
boat.short_description: Built by de Groot at Gorinchem, South Holland in 1997, 'Orion' was deisgned by Beechcraft and has a steel hull.
